Package com.tloj.game.rooms.roomeffects

Class Teleport

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.rooms.roomeffects.RoomEffect
com.tloj.game.rooms.roomeffects.Teleport
public class Teleport extends RoomEffect
Class that implements a room effect that teleports the character to a random room
Teleports the player to a random room in the same floor causing the player to forget the visited rooms(doesn't apply with NorthStar item)
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • applyEffect

      public boolean applyEffect(Character character)
      Applies the teleportation effect to the specified character. Teleports the character to a random room in the current floor, while printing relevant messages and updating the game state.
      Specified by:
      applyEffect in class RoomEffect
      Parameters:
      character - the character to apply the teleportation effect to
      Returns:
      true if the effect was successfully applied, false otherwise
